TEXT.TITLE: CHINA BUYS MALAYSIAN RBD PALM STEARINE
TEXT.BODY: China bought 6,000 tonnes of Malaysian refined bleached deodorised palm stearine today for May shipment at prices equivalent to around 270 to 275 dlrs per tonne fob, traders said. REUTER
